algorithm.title: FOREX IS SIMPLE. THE ASSISTANT TAKES THE HARD WORK.

steps.title: You don't need to learn analysis and risk
Finding where the price can reverse or accelerate
steps.description: We look for liquidity and inefficiency levels – that's usually where liquidity or impulse starts.

steps.title: Mark the entry point – only after confirmation
steps.description: We wait for confirmation: breakout and retest of a level, structure change or entry pattern – we enter only after analysis.

steps.title: Pre-set stop-loss and targets
steps.description: We calculate risk/reward, place stop beyond the level, set targets based on R/R, partially fixate at intermediate levels.
